about.summary: Array processing for numbers, strings, records, and objects.

commands: pytest --verbose --pyargs numpy -k "not (_not_a_real_test or test_sincos_float32 or test_may_share_memory_easy_fuzz or test_einsum_sums_cfloat64 or test_loss_of_precision or test_large_zip or test_may_share_memory_easy_fuzz or test_may_share_memory_harder_fuzz or test_unary_ufunc_call_fuzz or test_count_nonzero_all or test_diophantine_fuzz or test_generalized_sq_cases or test_may_share_memory_harder_fuzz or test_large_zip)" --durations=0

pytest --verbose --pyargs numpy -k "not (_not_a_real_test or test_sincos_float32 or test_may_share_memory_easy_fuzz or test_einsum_sums_cfloat64 or test_loss_of_precision or test_large_zip or test_may_share_memory_easy_fuzz or test_may_share_memory_harder_fuzz or test_unary_ufunc_call_fuzz or test_count_nonzero_all or test_diophantine_fuzz or test_generalized_sq_cases or test_may_share_memory_harder_fuzz or test_large_zip)" --durations=0

pytest --verbose --pyargs numpy -k "not (_not_a_real_test or test_sincos_float32 or test_may_share_memory_easy_fuzz or test_einsum_sums_cfloat64 or test_loss_of_precision or test_large_zip or test_may_share_memory_easy_fuzz or test_may_share_memory_harder_fuzz or test_unary_ufunc_call_fuzz or test_count_nonzero_all or test_diophantine_fuzz or test_generalized_sq_cases or test_may_share_memory_harder_fuzz or test_large_zip)" --durations=0

name: numpy

new_version_errors.1.18.4:
The recipe did not change in the version migration, a URL did not hash, or there is jinja2 syntax the bot cannot handle!

Please check the URLs in your recipe with version '1.18.4' to make sure they exist!

We also found the following errors:

 - could not hash URL template 'https://github.com/numpy/numpy/releases/download/v{{ version }}/numpy-{{ version }}.tar.gz'

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.18.4" %}

package:
  name: numpy
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/numpy/numpy/releases/download/v{{ version }}/numpy-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e0781ec6627e85f2a618478ee278893343fb8b40577b4c74b2ec15c7a5b8f698

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [py27]
  entry_points:
    - f2py = numpy.f2py.f2py2e:main  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    # gcc 7.3 segfaults on aarch64
    - clangdev    # [aarch64]
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - cython
    - libblas
    - libcblas
    - liblapack
  run:
    - python
  run_constrained:
    - libopenblas 0.3.7  # [ppc64le]

{% set tests_to_skip = "_not_a_real_test" %}
# Seems to fail with current version of blas for large numbers
# https://github.com/conda-forge/numpy-feedstock/pull/179#issuecomment-569591828
{% set tests_to_skip = tests_to_skip + " or test_sincos_float32" %}  # [linux64]
# Not too sure why this is failing on aarch64 because harder_fuzz is passing
{% set tests_to_skip = tests_to_skip + " or test_may_share_memory_easy_fuzz" %}    # [aarch64]
# Likely bugs in openblas????
# https://github.com/numpy/numpy/issues/14438#issuecomment-560940664
{% set tests_to_skip = tests_to_skip + " or test_einsum_sums_cfloat64" %}  # [ppc64le]
# Only the complex256 system is failing, but I don't know how to skip it on its own
# # https://github.com/numpy/numpy/issues/15243
{% set tests_to_skip = tests_to_skip + " or test_loss_of_precision" %}     # [ppc64le or aarch64]
# Probably needs too much memory on ppc64le, it sometimes fails on travis
{% set tests_to_skip = tests_to_skip + " or test_large_zip" %}   # [ppc64le]
# Extra slow tests on aarch64 and ppc64le
{% set tests_to_skip = tests_to_skip + " or test_may_share_memory_easy_fuzz" %}   # [ppc64le or aarch64]
{% set tests_to_skip = tests_to_skip + " or test_may_share_memory_harder_fuzz" %}   # [ppc64le or aarch64]
{% set tests_to_skip = tests_to_skip + " or test_unary_ufunc_call_fuzz" %}   # [ppc64le or aarch64]
{% set tests_to_skip = tests_to_skip + " or test_count_nonzero_all" %}   # [ppc64le or aarch64]
{% set tests_to_skip = tests_to_skip + " or test_diophantine_fuzz" %}   # [ppc64le or aarch64]
{% set tests_to_skip = tests_to_skip + " or test_generalized_sq_cases" %}   # [ppc64le or aarch64]
{% set tests_to_skip = tests_to_skip + " or test_may_share_memory_harder_fuzz" %}   # [ppc64le or aarch64]
{% set tests_to_skip = tests_to_skip + " or test_large_zip" %}   # [ppc64le or aarch64]

test:
  requires:
    - pytest
  commands:
    - f2py -h
    - export OPENBLAS_NUM_THREADS=1  # [unix]
    - set OPENBLAS_NUM_THREADS=1  # [win]
    - pytest --verbose --pyargs numpy -k "not ({{ tests_to_skip }})" --durations=0
  imports:
    - numpy
    - numpy.linalg.lapack_lite

about:
  home: http://numpy.scipy.org/
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: Array processing for numbers, strings, records, and objects.
  doc_url: https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/
  dev_url: https://github.com/numpy/numpy

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jakirkham
    - msarahan
    - pelson
    - rgommers
    - ocefpaf
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
